LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.label: paketlenmiş acil durum yiyeceği
LanguageData.MealSurvivalPack.description: Acil durumlarda hayatta kalabilmek için üretilmiş, paketlenmiş yüksek kaliteli yiyecek.
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.label: besin macunu yiyeceği
LanguageData.MealNutrientPaste.description: Protein, karbonhidrat, vitamin, aminoasit ve minerallerin sentetik bir karışımı. Vücudun ihtiyacı olan herşey, ancak kesinlikle iğrenç.
LanguageData.MealSimple.label: simple meal
LanguageData.MealSimple.description: A simple meal quickly cooked from a few ingredients.
LanguageData.MealFine.label: fine meal
LanguageData.MealFine.description: A complex dish assembled with care from a wide selection of ingredients.
LanguageData.MealLavish.label: lavish meal
LanguageData.MealLavish.description: A masterpiece of the culinary arts, this meal nourishes the body, mind, and soul.
LanguageData.Kibble.label: kibble
LanguageData.Kibble.description: Kibble animal feed made from mixed meat and plant sources.
LanguageData.Pemmican.label: pemmican
LanguageData.Pemmican.description: A preserved mashed mixture of fat and plant food. Tastes bland, but not offensive. It lasts a very long time without refrigeration.
